```{r}
fileName <- 'C:\\Users\\Matt\\Documents\\GitHub\\IntExtMNE\\data\\decim_epochs_S117Extero-epo.fif'
x <- mne$read_epochs(fileName)

ZZ <- data.frame(x$average()$data)

ZZ$ch_names <- factor(x$ch_names)

ZZZ <- gather(ZZ,timepoint,amplitude,-ch_names)


```

```{r}
ggplot(ZZZ,aes(x = timepoint, y = amplitude*1e6))+geom_line(aes(colour = ch_names))
```
